basics.name: Sagun Pandey
basics.label: Information Technology Intern (Test Automation Engineer)
basics.summary: Over 3 years of experience serving as a key contributor across all software development life cycle phases including analysis, architectural design, prototyping, development, and testing of applications using Java/J2EE technologies in various domains.

work.name: ExtremeTix (Ticketing Solution Company)
highlights: Created 'Test Automation Framework' for automation test scripts.
Converted manual test cases into automation smoke and regression suites.
Worked with the QA team in writing concise documentation to help configure the framework.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Coded and debugged multi-tiered Java-based applications to provide enterprise solutions.
Developed a Java-based SDK and driver software for a card reader.
Fixed bugs and implemented improvement features using Java and J2EE on large scale projects.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Core Java programming with Multithreading Exception Handling, File Handling, IO, Generics, and Java Collections.
Developed the entire MRP (Machine Readable Passport) Reading Module both backend and frontend.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Designed and developed applications using Scrum methodology.
Developed CMS like system majorly based on PHP and MYSQL.
Responsible for implementing and hosting of prototype systems on test servers.
